metrics.name: China Credit Proxy (CBON)
metrics.desc: VanEck China Bond ETF - Proxy for LGFV/Credit Stress

ai_insights.crash_analysis:
• Convergence Status: LOW - Only USD/JPY (155.64) shows a CRITICAL SHOCK signal. 10Y Treasury Auction (2.43x) and China Credit Proxy ($22.58) remain in NORMAL ranges.
  • SIMULTANEOUS MOVEMENT: Yields (4.02%) and USD/CNH (7.0707) are stable. Only USD/JPY indicates stress, lacking full convergence.
  • 10Y AUCTION DEMAND: Bid-to-Cover (2.43x) is above stress threshold (2.3x), showing healthy auction demand.
  • CHINA CREDIT STRESS: CBON ETF at $22.58 suggests no immediate LGFV/default risks.
ai_insights.news_summary:
• Stock futures dip entering final trading month of 2025 after rocky November rally.
  • No headlines directly linking to Treasury, Japan carry-trade, or China credit shocks.
  • Consumer stress noted (credit-card debt vs. retirement savings dilemma).
